src:
ویدیو؛ درگیری معترضان و پلیس ضد شورش هنگ کنگ

02 Nov 2019, 20:00

جنبش اعتراضی در هنگ کنگ روز شنبه با درگیری تظاهرکنندگان و پلیس ضد شورش در خیابان های مرکزی این منطقه خودگردان ادامه یافت. نیروهای امنیتی در نخستین ساعات بامداد روز شنبه دوم نوامبر برای جلوگیری از شکل گیری تجمع های اعتراض آمیز در خیابان‌ها مستقر شده بودند.
ساعاتی از پس شروع تظاهرات ماموران پلیس برای متفرق کردن معترضان و هواداران دموکراسی در هنگ کنگ اقدام به شلیک گاز اشک آور کردند. معترضان نیز که در یکی از خیابان های مرکزی هنگ کنگ تجمع کرده بودند برای جلوگیری از پیشروی ماموران پلیس موانع از قبل انباشته شده در میانه خیابان را آتش زدند.
هزاران تظاهرکننده که ماسک به صورت داشتند بدون توجه به ممنوعیت اعلام شده از سوی پلیس در منطقه تجاری مرکز هنگ کنگ تجمع کردند و برای بیست و دومین هفته متوالی با نیروهای ضد شورش درگیر شدند.
تظاهرکنندگان خواستار حفظ و تقویت اختیارات اعطا شده به این منطقه خودگردان هستند و دخالت آشکار چین در امور داخلی هنگ کنگ را برنمی تابند. ناآرامی های هنگ کنگ ماه ژوئن با اعتراض به لایحه استرداد مظنونان به ارتکاب جرم به چین آغاز شد و پس از لغو این لایحه با مطالبات گسترده تر از جمله برپایی انتخابات آزاد و مستقیم جهت برگزیدن رهبران آتی این منطقه ادامه یافت.
text:
'We caught it before it was tampered with,' says Bolsonaro about recording
Second doorman, entry of suspected murderer Marielle Franco to the condominium was authorized by 'Seu Jair'
02 Nov 2019, 20:22 by Writing
President Jair Bolsonaro said on Saturday (2) that took the recording of calls from the concierge of the condominium Vivendas da Barra, in Rio de Janeiro, where he has a house, so that they would not be tampered with. The president spoke with journalists about the subject during a visit to a dealership in Brasilia, where he bought a motorcycle.
"Now, I was in Brasilia, it is proven. Several of my passages on the House electronic panel, with attendance record, on Wednesday usually parliamentary is here. I was here, was not there. And another, we took [the recordings ], before it was tampered with, that they would try to tamper. We got all the memory from the answering machine that has been stored for years. It's not my voice, it's not seo Jair's. Now, what do I suspect? That the doorman read without signing or induced him to sign that. Now who is behind it? Governor Wilson Witzel, "he said.
Last Tuesday (29), Jornal Nacional revealed that a condominium porter told police that, hours before the murder of Councilwoman Marielle Franco and her driver, Anderson Gomes, former military police officer Elcio de Queiroz, suspected of participation in the crime, was at the scene and said he would go to house 58, which belongs to the president, and that "your Jair" answered the intercom and authorized the entry. Queiroz, meanwhile, went to the house of Ronnie Lessa, another suspect in the same condominium.
At that time, then Congressman Jair Bolsonaro was in Brasilia and participated in House votes on the same day. This Saturday, Bolsonaro again stated that he was out of Rio de Janeiro, as indicated by the House of Representatives records on the day. He did not make it clear by whom or for what reason the content would be tampered with, nor did he give any clues as to when he would have taken the recordings. Last Wednesday, the MP stated that an audio obtained during the investigations shows that it was retired PM Ronnie Lessa who released the entrance of former PM Élcio de Queiroz at Condomínio Vivendas da Barra. The two have been arrested since March this year. The same day, Councilman Carlos Bolsonaro (PSC-RJ) published an audio confirming the version of the MP.
On Friday (1), the president of the National Association of Federal Criminal Experts, Marcos Camargo, said the analysis of the evidence was superficial and that the absence of official expertise may lead to nullity of the process. The decision on the dismissal or nullity of the case is up to the Attorney General's Office (PGR).
